biotools.summary:
IMGT/GeneFrequency is the IMGT® tool providing the frequency usage of immunoglobulin (IG) and T cell receptor (TR) variable (V), diversity (D) and joining (J) genes in Homo sapiens and Mus musculus rearranged sequences from IMGT/LIGM-DB.
Analysis is based on the IMGT-ONTOLOGY concepts.

bioschemas.name: IMGT GeneFrequency
